definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
figurines of warriors and horses buried with the dead/Terracotta Army (historic site)
before the troops move, fodder and provisions go first (idiom); logistics comes before military maneuvers/an army marches on its stomach
pinyin: bing1 ma3 wei4 dong4 , liang2 cao3 xian1 xing2

sentences.english: After also sent from encirclement of the shaolin temple.
sentences.chinese: 之后还派了兵马包围住少林寺。

sentences.english: Tomorrow,  I look for forward to seeing the Terra Cotta Warriors and the Old City walls.
sentences.chinese: 我期待着明天参观兵马俑和古城墙。

sentences.english: People always connect Xi'an with the Big Goose Pagoda and Terracotta Warriors and Horses.
sentences.chinese: 人们一提到西安就会联想到大雁塔和兵马俑。

sentences.english: I want to see the Terra Cotta Warriors and the mountains of Yangshuo.
sentences.chinese: 我想去看看兵马俑和阳朔的山。

sentences.english: Dyne clay in the hand, and let not vibration inscription interference.
sentences.chinese: 索达因兵马在手，不容振铭干涉。

sentences.english: These terracotta warriors have guarded the Qin Shinghuang Tomb for over 2,000 years.
sentences.chinese: 这些兵马俑已经守卫秦始皇陵两千多年了。

sentences.english: British people get the chance to view the Terracotta Army without travelling to China.
sentences.chinese: 英国人最近不用去中国就能看到中国的兵马俑了。

sentences.english: Lintong farmers found the Terracotta Warriors in Shanxi.
sentences.chinese: 陕西临潼农民发现秦始皇兵马俑。

sentences.english: This is a real archeological treasure trove with its terra - cotta and horses.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个真正的考古宝库与地面兵马俑。

sentences.english: The museum of the Terracotta Army is located in Xi'An, Shanxi province.
sentences.chinese: 兵马俑博物馆坐落于陕西省西安市。

sentences.english: Tomorrow, I look forward to seeing the Terra Cotta Warriors and the Old City walls.
sentences.chinese: 明天，我将回去参观秦始皇兵马俑和古长城。

sentences.english: Great Wall, terracotta warriors and horses of the Yellow River, Kyushu brilliant mind Shu.
sentences.chinese: 长城黄河兵马俑，九州绚丽心意舒。

sentences.english: Where is the Mausoleum of the First Qin Emperor?
sentences.chinese: 秦始皇陵兵马俑在哪里？

sentences.english: I really want to see the old walls and terra-cotta warriors one day.
sentences.chinese: 我真的很想有一天去看看古代的墙和兵马俑。

sentences.english: Wooden attendants stood watch in a Zhou king's tomb in Liangdai centuries before the terra cotta army was created.
sentences.chinese: 周朝帝王墓穴中出土的木佣，比兵马俑早了几个世纪。

sentences.english: These terra cotta warriors are very life-like.
sentences.chinese: 秦兵马俑是非常写实的。

definition: Youzhou, ancient province in north Hebei and Liaoning/Fanyang 範陽|范阳 ancient city near modern Beijing
to serve the king diligently/to save the country in times of danger/to send troops to rescue the king
